channel.title: Atualizações ICAM - Populações Especiais
channel.description: Sinopses de artigos científicos produzidas pela equipa ICAM.

item.title: Orientações provisórias da FIGO sobre a COVID-19 durante a gravidez e puerpério
item.description: Global interim guidance on coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) during pregnancy and puerperium from FIGO and allied partners: Information for healthcare professionals. Poon, et al. International journal of gynaecology and obstetrics: the official organ of the International Federation of Gynaecology and Obstetrics. | 04-Apr-2020

item.title: Apresentação alternativa de infeção pelo SARS-CoV-2
item.description: Varicella-like exanthem associated with COVID-19 in an 8-year-old girl: A diagnostic clue? Genovese, et al. Pediatric dermatology. | 21-Apr-2020

item.title: Recomendações para a vigilância de crianças com sintomas característicos da doença de Kawasaki
item.description: Missed or Delayed Diagnosis of Kawasaki Disease During the 2019 Novel Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Pandemic. Harahsheh, et al. The Journal of pediatrics. | 23-Apr-2020

item.title: Doença de Kawasaki com co-infeção por COVID-19
item.description: COVID-19 and Kawasaki Disease: Novel Virus and Novel Case. Jones, et al. Hospital pediatrics. | 07-Apr-2020
